properties.Description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

identity.Description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.Description: The status of the current operation.

maximumConcurrency.Description: Defines how many resources can there be created at any given time.

organizationProfile.Description: Defines the organization in which the pool will be used.

agentProfile.Description: Defines how the machine will be handled once it executed a job.

fabricProfile.Description: Defines the type of fabric the agent will run on.

devCenterProjectResourceId.Description: The resource id of the DevCenter Project the pool belongs to.

organizations.Description: The list of Azure DevOps organizations the pool should be present in.

permissionProfile.Description: The type of permission which determines which accounts are admins on the Azure DevOps pool.

url.Description: The Azure DevOps organization URL in which the pool should be created.

projects.Description: Optional list of projects in which the pool should be created.

parallelism.Description: How many machines can be created at maximum in this organization out of the maximumConcurrency of the pool.

kind.Description: Determines who has admin permissions to the Azure DevOps pool.

organizations.Description: The list of GitHub organizations/repositories the pool should be present in.

url.Description: The GitHub organization URL in which the pool should be created.

repositories.Description: Optional list of repositories in which the pool should be created.

maxAgentLifetime.Description: How long should stateful machines be kept around. The maximum is one week.

sku.Description: The Azure SKU of the machines in the pool.

images.Description: The VM images of the machines in the pool.

osProfile.Description: The OS profile of the machines in the pool.

storageProfile.Description: The storage profile of the machines in the pool.

networkProfile.Description: The network profile of the machines in the pool.

name.Description: The Azure SKU name of the machines in the pool.

resourceId.Description: The resource id of the image.

aliases.Description: List of aliases to reference the image by.

buffer.Description: The percentage of the buffer to be allocated to this image.

secretsManagementSettings.Description: The secret management settings of the machines in the pool.

logonType.Description: Determines how the service should be run. By default, this will be set to Service.

certificateStoreLocation.Description: Where to store certificates on the machine.

observedCertificates.Description: The list of certificates to install on all machines in the pool.

keyExportable.Description: Defines if the key of the certificates should be exportable.

osDiskStorageAccountType.Description: The Azure SKU name of the machines in the pool.

subnetId.Description: The subnet id on which to put all machines created in the pool.

principalId.Description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.Description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.Description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
